entries.arrived_at_loc: Stand by for arrival of the drone vessel. Once it arrives begin to escort it through the Nym controlled sector.
entries.complete: Nice work. Nym's pilots are in an uproar over the apparent attack on their ships by the Hutt smuggler.
entries.failed_destroy: Pilot, you were supposed to get that ship through in one piece. You flubbed the whole operation. Report back to your superior.
entries.failed_protect: Pilot, you were supposed to get that ship through in one piece. You flubbed the whole operation. Report back to your superior.
entries.found_loc: We will send the ship in to these nav coordinates. Meet the ship there and escort it through Nym's sector.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the freighter as it moves through Nym's space. Any of Nym's men who come to retaliate must be eliminated before they can alert their companions of your presence. If successful Nym will believe that the Hutts are launching a full scale attack on his operations.
entries.quest_location_d: This operation is to take place in the Yavin system.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Meet the vessel at the supplied arrival Nav waypoint.
entries.split_quest_alert: Long range scans show that Nym's men are massing and preparing to attack the Hutts. Assist the Hutts in wiping out Nym's attack force.
entries.taunt_1: What are you doing in this sector Hutt?
entries.taunt_2: The Hutts have broken our agreement.
entries.taunt_3: I knew we couldn't trust the Hutts.
entries.taunt_4: It doesn't surprise me that the Hutts have betrayed us.
entries.taunt_5: Time to pay for your betrayal, Hutt.
entries.title: Yavin System: Escort the Captured Hutt Freighter
entries.title_d: The captured Hutt ship has been retrofit with the signature jammer and autopilot system. The jammer will allow you to remain hidden by the ships signature. When Nym's men scan the area all they will see is the Hutt ship and not your TIE. We will move this ship through Nym's territory. Since they are already highly angered they are sure to try to retaliate on the Hutt vessel. You are to protect the vessel and destroy any who try to attack it.
